original_text: Jesus arrived at the other side of Lake Galilee. He came to a place where the Gadarene people lived. Two men who had bad spirits in them came to meet him. These men lived outside, among some graves. They were very strong and dangerous. People were too afraid to walk that way because of them.
korean_text: 또 예수께서 건너편 가다라 지방에 가시매 귀신 들린 자 둘이 무덤 사이에서 나와 예수를 만나니 그들은 몹시 사나워 아무도 그 길로 지나갈 수 없을 지경이더라

sentences.original_text: Jesus arrived at the other side of Lake Galilee.
He came to a place where the Gadarene people lived.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 가다라 사람들이 사는 곳에 오셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: Two men who had bad spirits in them came to meet him.
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 영이 들린 두 남자가 그분을 만나러 왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: These men lived outside, among some graves.
sentences.korean_translation: 이 남자들은 바깥, 무덤들 사이에서 살았습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were very strong and dangerous.
People were too afraid to walk that way because of them.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그들 때문에 그 길로 걷는 것을 너무 무서워했습니다.
